name: LWT
description:
WASD to move, F to interact (throw your weapon, open doors, pick up dropped weapons), shift to "dash" (more like a scoot if we're being honest).

The objective of the game is to achieve and maintain a high score. Although there are many ways to lose points and the game sometimes seems unfair, your score will persist after each death. It is not a measure of your performance on any particular run; instead, your score in LWT is a measure of your perseverance, After reaching  certain score thresholds, you will be rewarded with a new, slight twist to the mechanics (more of these will be added).
